import{fromJS}from"immutable";import*as constants from"./constants";var defaultState=fromJS({login:false,postStatus:0//0預設  1 成功  2 失敗
});export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.ADD_ARTICLE:return state.set("postStatus",action.success);default:return state;}});
